bossDialog: If you're not gone by the count of ten, I'm going to smear your brains all over the walls. ...TEN!
Now THERE'S a face that needs a good beating. You've come to the right place!
Oh great, a human. I thought I smelled somethin' rotten in here. Have at you!

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_SPLASH} buff deals 10% more damage to adjacent creatures.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_SPLASH} buff deals its damage to 1 additional enemy.
cardBonuses.8: Your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_SPLASH} buff has a 10% chance to activate twice.

master.dialog: There's not much to say about Brownies, really. They pack one hell of a punch with their oversized hammers. Actually, do you suppose it's their hammers that are oversized, or their bodies that are a bit on the smaller side? Anyway, let's see how they stack up against the likes of you!
master.name: Buster

name: Brownie
